scripts.babel-c: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/ErrorWrapper.js src/Validator.js src/IPAddressValidator.js src/PhoneNumberValidator.js src/EmailValidator.js src/vlib.js --out-file dist/vlib.js --source-maps
scripts.babel-cw: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/ErrorWrapper.js src/Validator.js src/IPAddressValidator.js src/PhoneNumberValidator.js src/EmailValidator.js src/vlib.js --out-file dist/vlib.js --source-maps --watch
